name: Bets Cards Game
description:
This game is online, so you will need more people to play.

This game is about to make bets about how many rounds do you think are you going to win. If you fail, you will lose a live.  A round is represented by a card and in each round you will have to choose one card and if you choose the highest one, you will win. If someone choose  the same number card before you, you will lose. The first one who survives wins.

This game was made with special cards, so this means that the representation of some cards are a bit different.
